entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 6:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: WSW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening except rain along parts of the coast. Snowfall amount 5 cm except rainfall amount 5 mm along the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to snow before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
